segments.text: Over on the left, there's quite a bit of action happening with the children.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is precariously balanced on that wobbly-looking stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: My heart is practically in my mouth just watching him reach for those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It looks like the stool could tip backward at any moment; it's really unstable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's got one hand in the "COOKIE JAR" and the other holding a plate, very resourceful.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister stands below, her arm raised, clearly waiting for her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're both so engrossed in their little secret operation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I admire their teamwork, even if it is a bit risky.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This reminds me of childhood mischief, a nostalgic feeling almost.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But seriously, that stool is making me incredibly nervous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What if he falls and breaks something, or worse, gets hurt?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The thought of him tumbling down is genuinely alarming.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They certainly are taking quite a chance for those sweets.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I almost want to warn them, but I'm just an observer here.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Oh, those mischievous little rascals, they'll get into trouble!
segments.speaker: PAR
